text: Egha a kamaghɨn na mɨgei, “Akɨnafarir kam ghaze, dughiar kuram otogh mangɨ nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamiziba bar me avaragham. Ezɨ akɨnafarir kamɨn osizirir mam ghaze, gumazir okeiba, God kantrin kamɨn me batuegham. Ezɨ akɨnafarir kamɨn osizirir igharazir mam ghaze, te ifavaribagh amua pura pɨn akakagha ghaze guizbangɨra, a uaghan me batuegham.”
